p: B. microdonta and B. punctulata exhibited cytotoxicity, whereas B. pauciflosculosa, B. reticularioides, and B. sphenophylla showed moderate antimalarial activities. Only B. sphenophylla EO showed strong toxicity to bed bug viz., and 66.67% and 83.33% mortality in ‘Bayonne’ and ‘Ft.Dix’ in the fumigation bioassay. B. pauciflosculosa and B. reticularioides showed good antitrypanosomal activities.
